resources.string: 1 1/2 sticks butter, melted 4 cloves garlic, grated 2 tsp. garlic powder 1/2 tsp. dried parsley or Italian seasoning 1/4 tsp. kosher salt 1 loaf white bread, sliced into about 10 3/4-inch slices

Preheat oven to 400Â°. In a medium bowl, combine butter, garlic, garlic powder, dried parsley, and salt. Lay out bread slices onto a sheet tray and brush each side of each slice generously with the garlic-butter mixture.Bake the toast, flipping halfway through, until golden, about 12 minutes. Serve immediately.
